subject: Re: Royal Rehab Private Hospital Day Program pages

Janina.Hipolito@royalrehab.com.au

Hi Janina, 

Just confirming we have made the below updates : )

Hi Heath, Thanks for this. It looks great. I have some changes I would like to make. Day Rehabilitation page
  • Please change the list of "areas of expertise" to:
  • Orthopaedic rehabilitation
  • Neurological rehabilitation include stroke recovery, Parkinson's disease and multiple sclerosis
  • Post-spinal surgery rehabilitation
  • Reconditioning
  • For the Day Rehab blurbs for each service, can the "LEARN MORE" button be at the same place for every box (placed at the bottom)?
  • Can we make the PD Warrior text into one paragraph and not two?
Individual Day Rehab pages:
  • Please remove the 'placeholder' images and stats. If we do have additional images or stats for each discipline, we will add but for now please remove.
  • What is the specs for the feature image? I would like to assess how we can crop these images better to look well-formatted.
I also want to make a few other changes text-wise but we can talk about that today and I can do this myself on each page. Thanks Heath, Janina JANINA HIPOLITO​ MARKETING SPECIALIST E. Janina.Hipolito@royalrehab.com.au

Thanks Heath all looking great so far. I will come back to you with some edits shortly.

Kindest,

Janina

JANINA HIPOLITO​

MARKETING SPECIALIST

E.

Janina.Hipolito@royalrehab.com.au

Hi Janina, 

Confirming we have created the individual day program pages. You can access them from here:
https://royalrehab2020.wpperk.cloud/private-hospital/day-rehabilitation-programs/

We will need to replace the images in the body of the page. We have left the PD Warrior ones there as 'placeholders' for now. Also, we have left the statistic counters toward the bottom of the page. If there are relevant stats we can drop in there, we can use them, if not, we can remove them.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire
